mapper.sql: HIST_ID AS histId, INST_ID AS instId, WF_ID AS wfId, TASK_ID AS taskId, OPT_USER AS optUser, OPT_TYPE AS optType, OPT_SEQ AS optSeq, NEXT_ASSIGNER AS nextAssigner, TASK_OWNER AS taskOwner, TASK_BEGIN AS taskBegin, TASK_END AS taskEnd, TASK_REND AS taskRend, CREATED_BY AS createdBy, CREATED_DT AS createdDt, UPDATED_BY AS updatedBy, UPDATED_DT AS updatedDt
mapper.select: SELECT hist.*, TASK.TASK_DESCP_DISP from wf_inst_hist hist join wf_task task on task.TASK_ID=hist.TASK_ID where hist.inst_id=#{instId} order by hist.OPT_SEQ
